title: Spiral Mountain
description: The first area in any run. In 100% we are going to collect 6 Honeycombs around the mountain before we head up. In Any%, we are going straight up the mountain. The only notable trick to mention is Bottles Skip.

general.name: Bottles Skip (backflip method)
general.description: Backflip method to skip the Bottles cutscene at the top of Spiral Mountain.
